tool.name: Hapmap Filter
tool.description: and convert to IUPAC genotype codes
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
** Hapmap Filter - what it does**
This tool removes non-biallelic markers from an input HapMap file generated from AgriPlex/DaRT-converted genotype data. It also converts the genotype into IUPAC codes (https://www.bioinformatics.org/sms/iupac.html) used in TASSEL software (https://www.maizegenetics.net/tassel).
**Output Format:** A HapMap-formatted TSV file.
